projects.title: Sistem Informasi Penggemar Buku (SiMarKu)
projects.description: It's a book fan application where later in the application users can exchange borrow books, exchange books, donate books, and there is a message feature to facilitate communication between users.

projects.title: Point of Sale (POS) App
projects.description: Develop Point of Sale (POS) application that is integrated with midtrans payment gateway and also can connect with bluetooth printers. Available in the form of application developed with flutter and also website for admin developed using Laravel.

projects.title: Food Delivery Order App
projects.description: Develop Food Delivery Order App that consists of three applications, an application for users, an application for drivers, and an application for restaurants.
